Text: Oh! Thank you very much for this! Will I be able to burn it and play on my PSone console? Because some roms just do not work on the console, just emulation...

I'm sure you can. There might be games that only work on emulators, but I doubt that The Grinch is one of them. I don't have any CDs to burn to test it, but like I said, I'm sure that you can play it on your PSone.
Please seed people!  This game is tough to get anywhere.
Works great - plays w/ ePSXe.  Multi-language and even includes built-in cheats!  Thanks Spacehole
